app: 海康威视SPON IP网络对讲广播系统
seo: 海康威视,SPON,IP网络对讲广播系统,任意文件上传,漏洞检测
seo_en: Hikvision,SPON,IP Network Intercom Broadcast System,Arbitrary File Upload,Vulnerability Detection
summary: 检测海康威视SPON IP网络对讲广播系统中是否存在任意文件上传漏洞，通过上传测试文件并验证是否成功执行来确认漏洞存在。
summary_en: Detect arbitrary file upload vulnerabilities in Hikvision SPON IP Network Intercom Broadcast System by uploading a test file and verifying successful execution to confirm the vulnerability.
